location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Two photographs that depict Richard Henry Barter Snow, State Medical Officer, Bahrain

physicalDescription.extent: Two photographs held between a plastic sheet as one folio.

mods.abstract: Two black and white photographs of Richard Henry Barter Snow held in a plastic sheet on one folio (folio 101).One photograph depicts Snow from the front while standing and wearing a pin-stripe suit, a note on the back of the photograph dates it as 1940.The second photograph is smaller and shows Snow smiling while wearing a suit and holding a hat, a note on the reverse of the photograph states that it was taken at a wedding in 1937.
